import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import CryptoChart from'./CryptoChart';import LiveBTCPrice from'./LiveBTCPrice';import'./CryptoPriceTracker.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const intervals={'1h':'m1',// New interval for 1 hour
'24h':'h1','7d':'d1','1m':'d1','3m':'d1','1y':'d1'};const BitcoinPriceTracker=()=>{const[bitcoinData,setBitcoinData]=useState([]);const[interval,setInterval]=useState('1h');// Default interval to 1 hour
useEffect(()=>{const fetchBitcoinData=async()=>{try{const startDate=interval==='1y'?Date.now()-365*24*60*60*1000:interval==='3m'?Date.now()-90*24*60*60*1000:interval==='1m'?Date.now()-30*24*60*60*1000:interval==='7d'?Date.now()-7*24*60*60*1000:interval==='24h'?Date.now()-24*60*60*1000:Date.now()-60*60*1000;// 1 hour in milliseconds
const response=await axios.get('https://api.coincap.io/v2/assets/bitcoin/history',{params:{interval:intervals[interval],start:startDate,end:Date.now()}});const formattedData=response.data.data.map(point=>[new Date(point.time).getTime(),parseFloat(point.priceUsd)]);setBitcoinData(formattedData);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching Bitcoin data:',error);}};fetchBitcoinData();},[interval]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bitcoin-price-tracker-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LiveBTCPrice,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"interval-buttons",children:Object.keys(intervals).map(key=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setInterval(key),className:interval===key?'active':'',children:key},key))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CryptoChart,{data:bitcoinData,interval:interval})]});};export default BitcoinPriceTracker;
